--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> OOC: Good.

OOC: Remember the damage caused his cloak to flicker briefly, but then
reassertd itself. He would be invisible again. 

> BIC:
> 
> Trying to be as subtle as they could, Chop and Brody faced another
> direction completely, but a laser gun under the chopper swung towards
> Nightrazor and fired in quick bursts at him.

Nightrazor continued to accelerate! A quick scan of his systems told
him that while the last attack had briefly flickered his cloak, it had
reasserted itself, so he wondered how in the cosmos these guys were
able to see him? 

With a blast of power Nightrazor's boosters ignited pushing him still
further into the air as small bites of pain ripped again into his
sytems as bullets coaxed him still further away. 

He reset his cloak again! This was too much for the minion, it was time
to move on to the next point. If he stayed and fought he would have to
face not only these two, but the ship - bad odds to say the least. 

A few acrobatic spins and he moved up and away from the scene, leaving
the Maximals behind as best as he could!

Preston
(Nightrazor)
